column1: Luganda

Obuvunaanyizibwa bwoludda oluwabula Gavumenti kwekuwa Gavumenti ebirowoozo ebirungi ku ngeri emirimu bwegirina okutambuzibwEnjuuyi zombi zisobola okukolera awamu mu nsonga eziganyula abantu omuli ebyobulamu, ebyenjigiriza,  ebyokwerinda nebirala.
Nsisinkanye MathiasMpuuga wamu n'akulira akabondo k'ababaka ba Parliament_Ug abava mu Buganda ne twogera ku nsonga ezitwala Buganda ne Uganda mu maas
